info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 3:58AM PST until December 15 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FOR ABOVE 500 FEET UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, mainly above 500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area. For elevations above 500 feet. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions visit https://www.tripcheck.com or https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map or by calling 5 1 1
